sqlMap.select: select MSG_ID, BRANCH_ID, VER, SRC, DES, APP, MSG_NO, MSG_REF, WORK_DATE, EDIT_FLAG, RESERVE, ACCOUNT_NO, CURRENCY, BALANCE, BALANCE_CODE, SUBMIT_DATE, TOTAL_COUNT, ACC_ORG_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACC_TYPE, SUB_ACCOUNT_NO, DEPOSIT_RATE, CUSTOM_TYPE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DOCUMENT_NO, RESULT, ADD_WORD, MSG_STATUS, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, SND_USER_ID, SND_DATETIME, ACK_DATETIME, ERR_DATETIME, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3 from FTZ_IN_MSG_CTL where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into FTZ_IN_MSG_CTL (MSG_ID, BRANCH_ID, VER, SRC, DES, APP, MSG_NO, MSG_REF, WORK_DATE, EDIT_FLAG, RESERVE, ACCOUNT_NO, CURRENCY, BALANCE, BALANCE_CODE, SUBMIT_DATE, TOTAL_COUNT, ACC_ORG_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACC_TYPE, SUB_ACCOUNT_NO, DEPOSIT_RATE, CUSTOM_TYPE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DOCUMENT_NO, RESULT, ADD_WORD, MSG_STATUS, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, SND_USER_ID, SND_DATETIME, ACK_DATETIME, ERR_DATETIME, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3) values (#msgId:VARCHAR#, #branchId:VARCHAR#, #ver:CHAR#, #src:CHAR#, #des:CHAR#, #app:VARCHAR#, #msgNo:CHAR#, #msgRef:CHAR#, #workDate:VARCHAR#, #editFlag:CHAR#, #reserve:VARCHAR#, #accountNo:VARCHAR#, #currency:CHAR#, #balance:DECIMAL#, #balanceCode:CHAR#, #submitDate:CHAR#, #totalCount:DECIMAL#, #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#, #accountName:VARCHAR#, #accType:CHAR#, #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#, #depositRate:DECIMAL#, #customType:CHAR#, #documentType:CHAR#, #documentNo:VARCHAR#, #result:CHAR#, #addWord:VARCHAR#, #msgStatus:CHAR#, #makUserId:VARCHAR#, #makDatetime:VARCHAR#, #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#, #sndUserId:VARCHAR#, #sndDatetime:VARCHAR#, #ackDatetime:VARCHAR#, #errDatetime:VARCHAR#, #rsv1:VARCHAR#, #rsv2:VARCHAR#, #rsv3:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update FTZ_IN_MSG_CTL set BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#, VER = #ver:CHAR#, SRC = #src:CHAR#, DES = #des:CHAR#, APP = #app:VARCHAR#, MSG_NO = #msgNo:CHAR#, MSG_REF = #msgRef:CHAR#, WORK_DATE = #workDate:VARCHAR#, EDIT_FLAG = #editFlag:CHAR#, RESERVE = #reserve:VARCHAR#, ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#, CURRENCY = #currency:CHAR#, BALANCE = #balance:DECIMAL#, BALANCE_CODE = #balanceCode:CHAR#, SUBMIT_DATE = #submitDate:CHAR#, TOTAL_COUNT = #totalCount:DECIMAL#, ACC_ORG_CODE = #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#, ACCOUNT_NAME = #accountName:VARCHAR#, ACC_TYPE = #accType:CHAR#, SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#, DEPOSIT_RATE = #depositRate:DECIMAL#, CUSTOM_TYPE = #customType:CHAR#, DOCUMENT_TYPE = #documentType:CHAR#, DOCUMENT_NO = #documentNo:VARCHAR#, RESULT = #result:CHAR#, ADD_WORD = #addWord:VARCHAR#, MSG_STATUS = #msgStatus:CHAR#, MAK_USER_ID = #makUserId:VARCHAR#, MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:VARCHAR#, CHK_USER_ID = #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#, SND_USER_ID = #sndUserId:VARCHAR#, SND_DATETIME = #sndDatetime:VARCHAR#, ACK_DATETIME = #ackDatetime:VARCHAR#, ERR_DATETIME = #errDatetime:VARCHAR#, RSV1 = #rsv1:VARCHAR#, RSV2 = #rsv2:VARCHAR#, RSV3 = #rsv3:VARCHAR# where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR#

update FTZ_IN_MSG_CTL
BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
VER = #ver:CHAR#
SRC = #src:CHAR#
DES = #des:CHAR#
APP = #app:VARCHAR#
MSG_NO = #msgNo:CHAR#
MSG_REF = #msgRef:CHAR#
WORK_DATE = #workDate:VARCHAR#
EDIT_FLAG = #editFlag:CHAR#
RESERVE = #reserve:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#
CURRENCY = #currency:CHAR#
BALANCE = #balance:DECIMAL#
BALANCE_CODE = #balanceCode:CHAR#
SUBMIT_DATE = #submitDate:CHAR#
TOTAL_COUNT = #totalCount:DECIMAL#
ACC_ORG_CODE = #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNT_NAME = #accountName:VARCHAR#
ACC_TYPE = #accType:CHAR#
SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#
DEPOSIT_RATE = #depositRate:DECIMAL#
CUSTOM_TYPE = #customType:CHAR#
DOCUMENT_TYPE = #documentType:CHAR#
DOCUMENT_NO = #documentNo:VARCHAR#
RESULT = #result:CHAR#
ADD_WORD = #addWord:VARCHAR#
MSG_STATUS = #msgStatus:CHAR#
MAK_USER_ID = #makUserId:VARCHAR#
MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:VARCHAR#
CHK_USER_ID = #chkUserId:VARCHAR#
CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#
SND_USER_ID = #sndUserId:VARCHAR#
SND_DATETIME = #sndDatetime:VARCHAR#
ACK_DATETIME = #ackDatetime:VARCHAR#
ERR_DATETIME = #errDatetime:VARCHAR#
where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR#
and MAK_DATETIME = #rsv1:VARCHAR#
and CHK_DATETIME = #rsv2:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.sql:
where 1=1
and BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
and MSG_ID = #msgId#
and MSG_NO = #msgNo#
and CURRENCY = #currency#
and ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#
and SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#
and ACCOUNT_NAME like '%$accountName$%'
and MSG_STATUS = #msgStatus:CHAR#
#msgNos[]#
#msgStatuss[]#
and SUBMIT_DATE >= #rsv1#
and SUBMIT_DATE <= #rsv2#
order by MSG_ID,SUBMIT_DATE

where 1=1
and BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#
and MSG_ID = #msgId#
and MSG_NO = #msgNo#
and ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#
and SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#
and ACCOUNT_NAME like '%$accountName$%'
and MSG_STATUS = #msgStatus:CHAR#
and MSG_STATUS in ('01','02','04')
#msgNos[]#
and SUBMIT_DATE >= #rsv1#
and SUBMIT_DATE <= #rsv2#
order by MSG_ID,SUBMIT_DATE
